thread.section_title: Jimmyjane Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Jimmyjane | jimmyjane.com
thread.title: J.C.

author: J.C.
title: J.C.
text: I called and asked about a certain product for my wife and the service rep was patient, understanding and very knowledgeable. All of my orders were tracked accurately and the quality of their products is top notch. Some item are pricey but when it comes to waterproof products, safety and function is ultimate. I've tried the men's line of masturbators as well. ALL good stuff. All of the battery powered (or USB) products provide "super Human" results!!!! I've also bought the (cucumber) massage candle and enjoyed it greatly. Lastly, when hey say a product has many modes? It's more options than I could ever have imagined. Brilliant and very satisfying (if you know what I mean)!!!! I recommend Jimmyjane highly !!!!
